I just realized while reviewing a PR that Bitcoin Core still has code to ignore IP addresses in IPv6 range ::ff:ff00:0:0:0/72 because those were accidentally constructed due to a bug in version <=0.2.8 of the codebase (May 2010).  Harmless, as it's in reserved range 0::/8 anyway.
